name: 楊濠瞬
objective:
1. 阻抗匹配器
2. 濾波電路
3. 小訊號放大器
4. 弦波訊號產生器
5. 晶體振盪器
6. 混波器
1. Impedance matching circuits
2. Filters
3. Small-signal amplifiers
4. Sinusoidal wave generators 
5. Crystal oscillators
6. Mixers
schedule:
Week 1: Course content introduction
Week 2: Simulation tool teaching and band-pass filter (BPF) introduction (ex: duplexer in FDD)
Week 3: band-pass filter (BPF) design teaching (transmission line, S parameters)
Week 4: band-pass filter (BPF) design teaching (Smith chart, EM simulation)
Week 5: band-pass filter (BPF) implementation (PCB layout tool teaching)
Week 6: Project-I BPF examination
Week 7: Receiver (Rx) introduction (ex: Rx specification)
Week 8: low-noise amplifier (LNA) design teaching (DC bias circuits, noise matching)
Week 9: low-noise amplifier (LNA) design teaching (power matching, small-signal stability)
Week 10: low-noise amplifier (LNA) implementation (all components are on PCB)
Week 11: Project-II LNA examination
Week 12: Transmitter (Tx) introduction (ex: Tx specification)
Week 13: power amplifier (PA) design teaching (DC bias circuits, load pull, efficiency)
Week 14: power amplifier (PA) design teaching (source pull, large-signal stability)
Week 15: power amplifier (PA) implementation (all components are on PCB)
Week 16: Project-III PA examination
Week 17: Dragon Boat Festival
Week 18: Project resubmission and Sharing
scorePolicy:
實作一 Project I (BPF) : 30% (成品佔 20%, 口試佔 10%)
實作二 Project II (LNA) : 35%  (成品佔 25%, 口試佔 10%)
實作三 Project III (PA) : 35%  (成品佔 25%, 口試佔 10%)
materials: RF Circuit Design Theory and Applications by Reinhold Ludwig and Pavel Bretchko
